body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

* The metis web site is unavailable (http://glaros.dtc.umn.edu/gkhome/metis/metis/overview), including downloads.
* Does anyone know of an alternate download location?  How do I add this to `metis/package.yaml`?

```console
$ wget http://glaros.dtc.umn.edu/gkhome/fetch/sw/metis/metis-5.1.0.tar.gz
--2019-06-04 08:39:03--  http://glaros.dtc.umn.edu/gkhome/fetch/sw/metis/metis-5.1.0.tar.gz
Resolving proxyout.lanl.gov (proxyout.lanl.gov)... 192.12.184.19
Connecting to proxyout.lanl.gov (proxyout.lanl.gov)|192.12.184.19|:8080... connected.
Proxy request sent, awaiting response... 503 Service Unavailable
2019-06-04 08:40:02 ERROR 503: Service Unavailable.

```
title: Installation issue: metis - alternate download location needed
